mapper.select: SELECT student_no AS studentNo, dept_no AS deptNo, student_pw AS studentPw, student_name AS studentName, student_state AS studentState, student_address AS studentAddress, student_phone AS studentPhone, student_birth AS studentBirth, student_img AS studentImg, student_email AS studentEmail FROM student WHERE student_no = #{studentNo}

SELECT c.course_no AS courseNo, c.course_name AS courseName, c.dept_no AS deptNo, c.emp_no AS empNo, c.max_cnt AS maxCnt, c.current_cnt AS currentCnt, c.course_period AS coursePeriod, c.course_plan AS coursePlan FROM course c JOIN registration r ON c.course_no = r.course_no WHERE r.student_no = #{studentNo}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN att_state = '출석' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS attend, SUM(CASE WHEN att_state = '지각' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS late, SUM(CASE WHEN att_state = '결석' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS absent FROM attendance WHERE student_no = #{studentNo} AND course_no = #{courseNo}

SELECT att_no AS attNo, student_no AS studentNo, course_no AS courseNo, att_date AS attDate, att_state AS attState FROM attendance WHERE student_no = #{studentNo} AND course_no = #{courseNo} ORDER BY att_date
